metadata.Title: CVE-2020-15890 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low.
metadata.Description:
LuaJit through 2.1.0-beta3 has an out-of-bounds read because __gc handler frame traversal is mishandled.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-15890` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libluajit-5.1-2 - 2.1.0~beta3+git20220320+dfsg-4.1
libluajit-5.1-common - 2.1.0~beta3+git20220320+dfsg-4.1
luajit - 2.1.0~beta3+git20220320+dfsg-4.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: luajit package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.1.0~beta3+git20220320+dfsg-4.1').
